name: Turn the Tables
description:
This game is a research project to help preventing bullying in school. The sole purpose of this game is to collect data and hopefully write an article on the collected data. 

The game is about a girl called Violet who is starting a new school. Throughout the game she sees other people being bullied and she herself gets bullied as well. The game is mainly trying to show and teach the users on how to behave in these kinds of bullying situations. 

**Only responses are saved, no specific user data is saved or used so no problem on that. 

**Please give accurate answers if possible, thank you in advance <3

**There are lots of bugs so sorry about that :(
